00056 namespace RTT

00058 
00064     template< class T >
00065     class DataObject
00066 #if defined(OROBLD_OS_NO_ASM)
00067         : public DataObjectLocked<T>
00068 #else
00069         : public DataObjectLockFree<T>
00070 #endif
00071     {
00072     public:
00076         typedef T DataType;
00077         typedef T value_t;
00078 
00079     public:
00083         DataObject( const T& initial_value = T())
00084 #if defined(OROBLD_OS_NO_ASM)
00085             : DataObjectLocked<T>(initial_value)
00086 #else
00087             : DataObjectLockFree<T>(initial_value)
00088 #endif
00089         {}
00090     };
